short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VRZ Champ chrome extension, get live updates from vrzchamp.com and vote right from the extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VRZ Champ users get updates from vrzchamp.com through this extension. It allows for easy access spotlight battles, previous battles and voting details.
